name: RN apps: Mark as Unread channel maintains unread state on app reopen

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P4 - Low-Impact (Edge or unsuitable to repeat?)

inline.description:
RN: Mark as Unread channel maintains unread state on app reopen
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Mark any post as unread (don't leave the channel)
  2. Swipe up and put the app in the background
  3. Navigate to phone's home screen
  4. Tap on the Mattermost app to open again
inline.expectedResult: • Channel that was marked unread before app was put in the background maintains it's unread state after coming back from the background

customFields.Related ticket(s): (Story) Migrate 'components/post_view/reaction_list' module and associated tests to TypeScript — MM-20497
